vote.title: To Recognize and Celebrate the 10th Anniversary of Unity Baptist Church
vote.description:
Title
 
To Recognize and Celebrate the 10th Anniversary of Unity Baptist Church
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Unity Baptist Church was formed through the faithful merger of two congregations united by a shared vision of worship, fellowship, and service, laying the foundation for a strong and vibrant spiritual community; and
WHEREAS, Unity Baptist Church has served as a spiritual home and community anchor in the City of Columbus for the past ten years, offering a message of love, inclusivity, and personal growth to all who enter its doors; and
WHEREAS, Unity Baptist Church has fostered a welcoming and affirming environment for people of all backgrounds, beliefs, and walks of life, embodying the spirit of unity and compassion; and
WHEREAS, under the visionary leadership of its clergy and congregation, Unity Baptist Church has consistently promoted values of peace, healing, and social justice within both its membership and the broader Columbus community; and
WHEREAS, over the past decade, Unity Baptist Church has supported countless individuals through spiritual development programs, community outreach initiatives, and charitable partnerships that uplift and empower those in need; and
WHEREAS, the 10th Anniversary of Unity Baptist Church marks a significant milestone that reflects the strength, dedication, and enduring faith of its congregation, as well as its lasting impact on the fabric of Columbus; now, therefore
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council hereby recognizes and celebrates the 10th anniversary of Unity Baptist Church.
